issue.title: [C++][Docs] Expand C++ Cookbook
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17168](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17168). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the C++ Cookbook has very few examples compared to the Python Cookbook, even though C++ Arrow can be used for the same tasks. Achieving parity between the cookbooks would be useful for developers to be able to use Arrow via C++ as a primary language.

Requires creation of examples and some light supporting prose – Python Cookbook can likely be copied in structure and some prose to save time.
